name: the dice-card pile
description:
the jankiest game of them all!

try to survive as long as you can, and if you get hit, your controls change!

made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam!

audio may be a bit buggy

"Hard Boiled" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
